citations.narrative:
The male shih tzu #20 "Bingo" had clumps of matted hair on his underbelly and in the hair under his ears. Matted hair can
twist and pull at the skin and irritate the dog's skin causing irritation or infection.
Preventive care and treatment of dogs must be provided to ensure healthy and unmatted hair coats.
Correction Date: January 15, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(a)(4) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The male shih tzu #20 "Bingo" had clumps of matted hair on his underbelly and in the hair under his ears. Matted hair can 
twist and pull at the skin and irritate the dog's skin causing irritation or infection.  
Preventive care and treatment of dogs must be provided to ensure healthy and unmatted hair coats.  
Correction Date: January 15, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
